news.title: Google parent Alphabet shares are down premarket after its earnings beat. Here's what's happening
news.summary: Alphabet shares continued their decline on Thursday after the company said it would hugely increase its AI spending in 2026. Alphabet shares continued its decline on Wednesday.

news.title: Layoffs in January were the highest to start a year since 2009, Challenger says
news.summary: The recent narrative centering on a no-hire, no-fire labor market. The data suggests that the layoff part of the equation could be stepping up.

news.title: Bitcoin drops below $70,000 as sell-off continues
news.summary: Some market watchers have suggested $70,000 is a key level to watch. A break below that could lead to more falls for bitcoin.

news.title: Peloton posts weak holiday quarter after splashy product overhaul fails to land
news.summary: Peloton's product overhaul was designed to bring in new customers and encourage existing members to trade up. Instead, shoppers turned away from higher prices.

news.title: Silver resumes its slide, plunging 12%, after short-lived rebound
news.summary: Silver prices slid as much as 16% on Thursday, snapping a two-day rebound. Investors continued to unwind positions as investors continued to unload positions.

news.title: Software ate the world. Now, Wall Street is worried AI will eat software.
news.summary: Investors have quickly moved to sell shares of companies that looked like they could be on the menu. Investors have quickly sold shares of firms that looked as if they could have been on the Menu.

news.title: ‘This is our second marriage’: We’re in our 60s. How do we split expenses if we move in together and rent one house?
news.summary: “We have been taking turns living in his house and my house,” he says. “We’ve been taking it in turns to stay in each other’s homes.”

news.title: Peloton is losing money again as subscriptions keep falling. The stock is tumbling.
news.summary: Peloton reports quarterly losses, as connected-fitness subscriptions fall to a more than four-year low. Peloton’s stock falls as the maker of home-f fitness products again reported quarterly losses.

news.title: Here’s the smart way to play the stock market’s Super Bowl Indicator
news.summary: Bulls want the Seahawks; bears cheer the Patriots. Why you shouldn't worry if your team loses. What do you think? Share your thoughts in the comments below.

news.title: What this famed short seller is waiting for before betting against AI stocks
news.summary: Muddy Waters’ CEO Carson Block says investors need to bide their time before trying to short the AI revolution. Block: “We’re in the early stages of a revolution that will change the world.”
